author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-4521: Stop using the 'force' option for recovery replication. This will keep some less common unnecessary replications from happening.

author: lehmi
msg: PDFBOX-1496: cache the resources of a page to avoid recreating them every time getResources is called, added some generics

author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-4511: When a new index is replicated into place, we need to update the most recent replicatable index point without doing a commit. This is important for repeater use cases, as well as when nodes may switch master/slave roles.
